long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This AI Accessibility Enhancer allows people who are visually impaired to read information from images, there is also a tool that describes websites and one that automatically updates semantic tags to assist screen readers. 

(quickly tap the I key twice to toggle image mode and tap the V key twice to toggle voice mode)
